skillTree.name: Marauder Chariot
skillTree.description: Marauder mobs are awarded even greater mobility when riding their crude chariots of bone and wood, lashed together with the guts and sinew of the vanquished.

skillTree.name: Juggernaut
skillTree.description: Mighty beasts of groaning iron and brass, taller than a man and possessed of a crushing mass.

skillTree.name: Aura of Chaos
skillTree.description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

skillTree.name: Burning Brand
skillTree.description: What magic can penetrate the searing hatred within the minds of the Blood God's most brutal followers.

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death.

skillTree.name: Fury of Styrbjorn
skillTree.description: "We will slaughter them all, and laugh as they beg for mercy. It will be a good day."

skillTree.name: Hunters of Souls
skillTree.description: The Great Hound of War thirsts eternally for blood and slaughter, its rage manifesting itself in the unstoppable martial spirit of its warriors.

skillTree.name: Slayer of Souls
skillTree.description: Styrbjorn's ascension to the throne saw his clan grow in power and influence, his daring leadership and peerless battle skill bringing victory on countless raids staged against the traditional foes of the tribe.

skillTree.name: Wolves of Strovengaard
skillTree.description: Strovengaard's wolves will follow its Jarl, defending his person with great savagery and scant regard for their own lives.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Horrible Regeneration" for Skin Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Skin Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Skin Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Waveriders of the North
skillTree.description: "Only a foolish hunter returns to the same hunting ground every day. A wise hunter varies his hunts, so as not to hunt any one of his prey-flocks to extinction."

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +15% after winning a battle

skillTree.name: Bloodthirsty Raiders
skillTree.description: Styrbjorn's army is usually largely assembled from his loyal berserker warriors, also known as Savages, they are a brutal sect of Northmen warriors, known chiefly for being subject to terrifying battle-frenzies.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -15% for Chaos Warriors, Chosen, and Chaos Knights of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Butcher of Immortals
skillTree.description: Styrbjorn has slain tens of thousands of foes in battle, and has amply demonstrated the favour of his god Khorne by doing so. The Jarl's naturally prodigious strength is further augmented by an unnatural constitution, as the blessings of his god has made him capable to shrug off even the most terrible of blows with ease.

skillTree.name: Bloodfather's Call
skillTree.description: "My Master is the Beginning and he is the End. He is the Master of mortals, and the core of our Dead Hearts. Deny him and you deny yourselves. Honour him, and acknowledge he to whom we owe it all."

skillTree.name: Infernal Champion
skillTree.description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Quicksilver
skillTree.description: Blink and you die.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Dominating Presence
skillTree.description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fearsome Warriors
skillTree.description: Those who do not bend the knee to the Gods of the North soon find all they hold dear obliterated before them.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Chosen of Khorne, Chaos Warriors of Khorne, Marauders of Khorne and Forsaken of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for Chosen of Khorne, Chaos Warriors of Khorne, Marauders of Khorne and Forsaken of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Chosen of Khorne, Chaos Warriors of Khorne, Marauders of Khorne and Forsaken of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +9% for Chosen of Khorne, Chaos Warriors of Khorne, Marauders of Khorne and Forsaken of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Chosen of Khorne, Chaos Warriors of Khorne, Marauders of Khorne and Forsaken of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Chosen of Khorne, Chaos Warriors of Khorne, Marauders of Khorne and Forsaken of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Beast Slayers
skillTree.description: Delighting in death and suffering, these savage warriors follow their ignoble Lord wherever he goes.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +6% for Chaos Knights of Khorne, Chaos Chariots of Khorne, Skullcrushers of Khorne and Marauder Horsemen of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for Chaos Knights of Khorne, Chaos Chariots of Khorne, Skullcrushers of Khorne and Marauder Horsemen of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +9% for Chaos Knights of Khorne, Chaos Chariots of Khorne, Skullcrushers of Khorne and Marauder Horsemen of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Chaos Knights of Khorne, Chaos Chariots of Khorne, Skullcrushers of Khorne and Marauder Horsemen of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Chaos Knights of Khorne, Chaos Chariots of Khorne, Skullcrushers of Khorne and Marauder Horsemen of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Chaos Knights of Khorne, Chaos Chariots of Khorne, Skullcrushers of Khorne and Marauder Horsemen of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Unnatural Selection
skillTree.description: Only the fiercest creatures can survive the frozen north; the strongest are rounded up for war and starved into viciousness, ready for the next battle.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Flesh Hounds of Khorne, Chaos Warhounds, Spawn of Khorne and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +6% for Flesh Hounds of Khorne, Chaos Warhounds, Spawn of Khorne and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Flesh Hounds of Khorne, Chaos Warhounds, Spawn of Khorne and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +9% for Flesh Hounds of Khorne, Chaos Warhounds, Spawn of Khorne and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Flesh Hounds of Khorne, Chaos Warhounds, Spawn of Khorne and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for Flesh Hounds of Khorne, Chaos Warhounds, Spawn of Khorne and Marauder Chariots units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Frostbitten
skillTree.description: The intense cold cuts into the flesh, burning the foe's extremities until they drop off altogether!

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Skin Wolves, Norscan Trolls, and Norscan Ice Trolls units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hail of Teeth
skillTree.description: The razor-sharp hail of the north is not the only danger in the Norscan sky – its airborne beasts are just as deadly and far less predictable.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Manticore and Frost Wyrm units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Monsters of the North
skillTree.description: Giant, deadly, and able to take orders, this Lord’s monstrosities are especially terrifying and lethal.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Fimir Warriors, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Fimir Warriors, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Fimir Warriors, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Fimir Warriors, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Fimir Warriors, Norscan Giant, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Champions of the North
skillTree.description: In spite of their savage nature, they are possessed of a savage code of conduct and form a loose brotherhood of those considered worthy.

effects.description:
Armour: +12 for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Marauders, Marauder Spearmen, Marauder Berserkers, and Marauder Champions units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hardened Hunters
skillTree.description: No beast too large, no adversary too great; no quarry - mortal or otherwise - can evade them.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +12% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Marauder Hunters, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Icy Wrath
skillTree.description: The intense cold and near-constant darkness of the far north make for a certain kind of killer.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Manticore, Skin Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Manticore, Skin Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Norscan Warhounds, Norscan Ice Wolves, Manticore, Skin Wolves, and Marauder Chariots units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hulks of Death
skillTree.description: The freezing darkness and stunning violence of the far north bring no small solace to those who have lost everything and wish to forget.

effects.description:
Armour: +12 for Norscan Trolls, Norscan Ice Trolls, Frost Wyrm, Norscan Giant, Fimir, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Norscan Trolls, Norscan Ice Trolls, Frost Wyrm, Norscan Giant, Fimir, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 8% for Norscan Trolls, Norscan Ice Trolls, Frost Wyrm, Norscan Giant, Fimir, Feral Mammoth, and War Mammoth units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fight or Die!
skillTree.description: There is no other choice. There never was.

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Takers of All
skillTree.description: That which is not offered up to the Dark Gods of the North in tribute is harvested by their servants for their own petty gain.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.name: Norse Resilience
skillTree.description: The bleak, brutal landscape of the far north breeds bloody, warlike tribes in thrall to Chaos' delicious, twisted power.

skillTree.name: Swelling of Doom
skillTree.description: Maybe it is the influence of the Dark Gods that has caused the populace to burgeon and proliferate beyond their natural bounds?

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Ruination
skillTree.description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

effects.description:
Attrition suffered by defender: +5% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +10% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +15% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Savage Skills
skillTree.description: There's something about the harsh, unforgiving nature of northern life that makes its occupants fight harder and longer than many of their soft, southern equivalents.

skillTree.name: Spawn of Chaos
skillTree.description: The tendrils (and tentacles!) of the Northern Gods reach down from the poles and far across the world, twisting and corrupting all they touch.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +150
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fuelled by War
skillTree.description: War and glory before the Gods are the determining elements in every decision made; there is nothing else worth living - or dying - for.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: High Jarl of Skaeling
backgroundSkills.description: Egil Styrbjorn, known also as the Slayer of Souls and the Butcher of Immortals is a Norscan High Jarl of Skaeling, and one of the greatest champions of the Blood God Khorne to ever walk the land.

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.
Reflects melee damage dealt to unit back at the attacker

items.name: Chaos Armour of Styrbjorn
items.description: His naturally prodigious strength is further augmented by an unnatural constitution, as the blessings of his god has made him capable to shrug off even the most terrible of blows with ease.

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

items.name: Garmr & Gormr
items.description: The twin hellforged battle-axes of the High Jarl of Strovengaard; ancient daemon weapons forged in the realms beyond flesh in honour of the bloody wolves said to accompany Khorne the Blood God on his wild hunts across the heavens, which drive the sun to cower and flee before the god's fury, creating the alternation of night and day in Norscan mythology.
